plot: A fire in a Church in the present day. A mysterious woman in a mental institute for few years now. An inquisitorial trial in 1347. And if all this had a link?
title: Sentence finale
plot_es: A fire in a Church in the present day. A mysterious woman in a mental institute for few years now. An inquisitorial trial in 1347. And if all this had a link?
plot_en: A fire in a Church in the present day. A mysterious woman in a mental institute for few years now. An inquisitorial trial in 1347. And if all this had a link?

cast.role: Mme Hécate - une vieille femme mystérieuse
cast.name: Marie Mergey
